situation.title: Theatre, film and other artistic performances

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Theatre, film and other artistic performances including the circus and variety shows are not allowed to happen in public. All planned performances must be rescheduled or cancelled. Cinemas are also closed.

Rehearsals in theatres without the presence of the public can go forward.
